Acid Resistance.name: Acid Resistance
Acid Resistance.description: Takes half damage from acid-based attacks.

Actually....name: Actually...
Actually....description: You have advantage on Intelligence checks to recall obscure information.

Adaptive Physiology.name: Adaptive Physiology
Adaptive Physiology.description: Advantage on checks to resist physical alterations.

Air Cushion.name: Air Cushion
Air Cushion.description: You can use your reaction to reduce falling damage to 0.

Always Prepared.name: Always Prepared
Always Prepared.description: You can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

Ambidextrous.name: Ambidextrous
Ambidextrous.description: No penalties for using either hand.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Can breathe both air and water.

Anatomical Expertise.name: Anatomical Expertise
Anatomical Expertise.description: You have advantage on attacks targeting specific body parts.

Ancient Knowledge.name: Ancient Knowledge
Ancient Knowledge.description: All higher-tier skills are unlocked and can be trained to level 20.

Arcane Insight.name: Arcane Insight
Arcane Insight.description: You have advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks related to understanding magical effects or items.

Arena Veteran.name: Arena Veteran
Arena Veteran.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed in combat situations.

Aura Reading.name: Aura Reading
Aura Reading.description: You can detect diseases and emotional disturbances in creatures within 30 feet.

Aura of Gloom.name: Aura of Gloom
Aura of Gloom.description: Enemies within 10 feet of you have disadvantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks.

Aura of Protection.name: Aura of Protection
Aura of Protection.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws.

AutoBucklerActivation.name: AutoBucklerActivation
AutoBucklerActivation.description: Forms a metallic buckler on command or by shaking your wrist.

Back Patch Bonus.name: Back Patch Bonus
Back Patch Bonus.description: If an eligible Back Patch is added, this benefit is doubled.

Battle Dancer.name: Battle Dancer
Battle Dancer.description: Your AC increases by 2 when you're not wearing armor.

Beast Whisperer.name: Beast Whisperer
Beast Whisperer.description: You can communicate simple ideas with animals.

Blast Resistant.name: Blast Resistant
Blast Resistant.description: You have resistance to fire damage and thunder damage.

Bloodsense.name: Bloodsense
Bloodsense.description: You can detect living creatures within 30 feet by sensing their blood.

Bonked.name: Bonked
Bonked.description: Has a 5% chance to inflict Bonked on any mob struck with this weapon.

Buffet Enchantment.name: Buffet Enchantment
Buffet Enchantment.description: The crossbow will not run out of basic ammunition.
Buffet Enchantment.effect: Additional ammunition types can be loaded and fired, though special bonuses apply only to the stock ammunition.

Calming Presence.name: Calming Presence
Calming Presence.description: You can use your action to end the frightened condition on an ally within 30 feet.

Camouflage Expert.name: Camouflage Expert
Camouflage Expert.description: You have advantage on Stealth checks in natural environments.

Cat-like Reflexes.name: Cat-like Reflexes
Cat-like Reflexes.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Center Stage.name: Center Stage
Center Stage.description: When you're the target of an attack, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

Charm Resistance.name: Charm Resistance
Charm Resistance.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

Coin Burst.name: Coin Burst
Coin Burst.description: All mobs killed with this weapon have a 20% chance to burst into a pile of gold coins upon death.
Coin Burst.effect: The number of coins is equal to the (value of the items in their inventory) + (level x 10).

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
Cold Blood.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

Cold Immunity.name: Cold Immunity
Cold Immunity.description: You are immune to cold damage and environmental effects of extreme cold.

Cold Resistance.name: Cold Resistance
Cold Resistance.description: Takes half damage from cold-based attacks.

Critical Gamble.name: Critical Gamble
Critical Gamble.description: Every shot has a 50% chance to be a critical hit, dealing double damage.

Crowd Dispersal.name: Crowd Dispersal
Crowd Dispersal.description: You have advantage on Strength checks to push, shove, or knock prone multiple targets at once.

Crowd Favorite.name: Crowd Favorite
Crowd Favorite.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks to influence crowds or gather information in urban settings.

DamageReflect.name: DamageReflect
DamageReflect.description: Adds 10% Damage Reflect to all equipped armor.

Danger Sense.name: Danger Sense
Danger Sense.description: You can take the Search action as a bonus action on your turn.

Dark One's Blessing.name: Dark One's Blessing
Dark One's Blessing.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your Warlock level.

Darkvision.name: Darkvision
Darkvision.description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

Demolitions Expert.name: Demolitions Expert
Demolitions Expert.description: You have advantage on checks to disarm traps and on saving throws against explosive devices.

DemonWorshipperDetection.name: DemonWorshipperDetection
DemonWorshipperDetection.description: All demon worshippers are visible and marked on your map.

Dimensional Awareness.name: Dimensional Awareness
Dimensional Awareness.description: Your body can adapt to a wide range of environments and situations. +1 in one skill of your choice at the start of each floor.

Disease Resistance.name: Disease Resistance
Disease Resistance.description: Immune to common diseases and ailments.

Divine Protection.name: Divine Protection
Divine Protection.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Eagle Eye.name: Eagle Eye
Eagle Eye.description: You can accurately hit targets at twice the normal range.

Earth Sense.name: Earth Sense
Earth Sense.description: Can detect vibrations in the ground up to 60 feet.

Elemental Affinity.name: Elemental Affinity
Elemental Affinity.description: You have resistance to lightning and cold damage.

Embarrassing Strikes.name: Embarrassing Strikes
Embarrassing Strikes.description: When you land a critical hit, the target has disadvantage on their next action due to shame.

Enhanced Mob Detection.name: Enhanced Mob Detection
Enhanced Mob Detection.description: Increased ability to detect mobs on the map.

Enhanced Vision.name: Enhanced Vision
Enhanced Vision.description: Enhances all dark vision effects. Allows for heat vision and other visible-light viewing options.

Environmental Protection.name: Environmental Protection
Environmental Protection.description: Protects the eyes from a variety of environmental hazards, including magic-based attacks that render the user blind.

Experimental Resistance.name: Experimental Resistance
Experimental Resistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poisons and magical effects.

Explosive Expertise.name: Explosive Expertise
Explosive Expertise.description: +50% range and accuracy for all thrown explosives.

Fae Fury.name: Fae Fury
Fae Fury.description: For every female in your party, up to thirty, this items damage and firing speed is increased.
Fae Fury.effect: Add an extra attack per round per female member of the party. Add 1d12 per female member of the party.

Fearsome Presence.name: Fearsome Presence
Fearsome Presence.description: Creatures that fail a Wit save against your abilities are frightened of you for 1 minute.

Fey Ancestry.name: Fey Ancestry
Fey Ancestry.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put you to sleep.

Fire Affinity.name: Fire Affinity
Fire Affinity.description: You have resistance to fire damage and can speak to fire elementals.

Fire Resistance.name: Fire Resistance
Fire Resistance.description: Takes half damage from fire-based attacks.

FireImmunity.name: FireImmunity
FireImmunity.description: User is impervious to natural fire.

FireResistance.name: FireResistance
FireResistance.description: User is resistant to fire-based spells.

FireSpellBoost.name: FireSpellBoost
FireSpellBoost.description: All spells with a fire attack now deal (Intelligence)% more damage.

First Strike.name: First Strike
First Strike.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls.

Flexible Form.name: Flexible Form
Flexible Form.description: Can squeeze through spaces as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: Can fly at a speed of 30 feet.

Fragile Power.name: Fragile Power
Fragile Power.description: Your damage spells deal an extra die of damage, but you have -2 to your AC.

Freeballing.name: Freeballing
Freeballing.description: And I’m freeeeee! Freeee Ballling! Usually reserved for monk classes and those too soused to reliably dress themselves, recipients of this benefit receive an additional 100% damage bonus to all attacks that originate below the waist. In addition, all skills that originate from below the waist train 20% faster. But as the name implies, this benefit allows only a single layer of armor or clothing to cover your crotch area. And since you’re already wearing these, it looks like you won’t be getting trousers anytime soon.
Freeballing.effect: 100% additional bonus damage and 20% additional experience for all attacks that originate below the waist

Frozen Aura.name: Frozen Aura
Frozen Aura.description: The air around you is perpetually chilled. You have advantage on Stealth checks in snowy environments, and your melee attacks deal an additional 1d4 cold damage.

Gravity Defiance.name: Gravity Defiance
Gravity Defiance.description: You can slow your fall rate and take no damage from falls of 60 feet or less.

Gruesome Display.name: Gruesome Display
Gruesome Display.description: After killing an enemy, nearby foes must make a Wit save or be frightened for 1 round.

Guardian's Presence.name: Guardian's Presence
Guardian's Presence.description: Allies within 5 feet of you gain +2 to their AC.

Gut Instinct.name: Gut Instinct
Gut Instinct.description: You have advantage on Medicine checks related to internal injuries.

Heat Aura.name: Heat Aura
Heat Aura.description: Creatures within 5 feet take 1d4 fire damage at the start of their turn.

Heat Resistance.name: Heat Resistance
Heat Resistance.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Heat Resistant.name: Heat Resistant
Heat Resistant.description: You have resistance to fire damage and advantage on saving throws against heat-based effects.

Heavenly Connections.name: Heavenly Connections
Heavenly Connections.description: Once per day, you can attempt to contact your demigod employer for advice or assistance.

Heavy Armor.name: Heavy Armor
Heavy Armor.description: Natural armor grants +2 bonus to AC.

Honor Bound.name: Honor Bound
Honor Bound.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks when dealing with nobility or in formal settings.

Host Dependency.name: Host Dependency
Host Dependency.description: Must inhabit a host to survive.

Hypnotic Gaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
Hypnotic Gaze.description: You can use your action to attempt to charm a creature within 30 feet, forcing a Wit saving throw.

Illusory Escape.name: Illusory Escape
Illusory Escape.description: Once per short rest, when you would take damage, you can use your reaction to create an illusion of yourself and teleport up to 30 feet away.

Immovable.name: Immovable
Immovable.description: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws against effects that would move you against your will.

Incremental Damage.name: Incremental Damage
Incremental Damage.description: This weapon's damage increases by 1.5% for every mob it kills that is no more than 10 levels below the current wielder's level.

Infection.name: Infection
Infection.description: Successful hits have a 10% chance to inflict Tetanus, dealing 1d4 damage per round for 3 rounds.
Infection.effect: 10% chance to deal 1d4 damage per round for 3 rounds.

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.description: You can blend into a crowd, gaining advantage on Stealth checks in populated areas.

Infrared Vision.name: Infrared Vision
Infrared Vision.description: Can detect heat signatures up to 30 feet.

Insightful.name: Insightful
Insightful.description: You have advantage on Perception checks to determine a creature's emotional state.

Inspiring Presence.name: Inspiring Presence
Inspiring Presence.description: Allies within 30 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

Iron Stomach.name: Iron Stomach
Iron Stomach.description: You're immune to poison and have advantage on Constitution saving throws against ingested substances.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
Iron Will.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Keen Edge.name: Keen Edge
Keen Edge.description: Your bladed weapons deal an additional 1d4 damage.

Keen Senses.name: Keen Senses
Keen Senses.description: Advantage on Perception checks involving smell.

LavaImmunity.name: LavaImmunity
LavaImmunity.description: User is impervious to lava attacks.

Legendary Strength.name: Legendary Strength
Legendary Strength.description: You can carry, push, drag, or lift twice as much as normal.

Life-Drain.name: Life-Drain
Life-Drain.description: If you've ever longed for a touch that literally takes your breath away, congrats on picking the succubus race! Your mere caress is deadlier than the average internet spoiler, zapping 2d6 necrotic damage every 10 seconds from anyone foolish enough to get cozy. Every handshake could be a eulogy, every hug a health hazard. But hey, on the upside, you'll regain hit points as fast as you lose friends. It's probably for the best—given this touch of doom, it’s a good thing almost everyone you've ever loved or wanted to hug is already dead. Embrace your solitude; who needs enemies when your affections are lethal?

Light-footed.name: Light-footed
Light-footed.description: You can move through difficult terrain without penalty.

Living Shield.name: Living Shield
Living Shield.description: You can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack roll against an ally within 5 feet of you.

Loaded.name: Loaded
Loaded.description: All non-hidden creatures wearing magical gear are indicated on your map. Particularly useful when you only want to hang out with the real fashionistas and not just the posers wearing fake shit. Also good if you want to sneak up behind someone, bonk them on their head, and steal all their stuff.

Toughness.name: Toughness
Toughness.description: Amazonians possess an extraordinary level of physical resilience, granting them a natural bonus to their maximum health. They shrug off minor injuries and keep fighting, making them formidable opponents on the battlefield.

Natural Leader.name: Natural Leader
Natural Leader.description: Amazonians exude a commanding presence that inspires those around them. Allies within a certain range gain a boost to their attack rolls and saving throws, because nothing says 'follow me' like someone who can bench-press a mountain and look good doing it.

Long-Range Expert.name: Long-Range Expert
Long-Range Expert.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against targets more than 100 feet away.

Lucky Break.name: Lucky Break
Lucky Break.description: Once per short rest, you can reroll a failed ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

Lyrical Memory.name: Lyrical Memory
Lyrical Memory.description: You can perfectly recall any poem or song you've heard at least once.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: Advantage on saves against magical effects.

ManaGenita's Favor.name: ManaGenita's Favor
ManaGenita's Favor.description: Removes automatic hostility by worshippers of Mana Genita.

Master Craftsman.name: Master Craftsman
Master Craftsman.description: You can identify the properties of any metal item by examining it for 1 minute.

Master of Disguise.name: Master of Disguise
Master of Disguise.description: You have advantage on Deception checks when trying to pass yourself off as someone else.

Melee Immunity.name: Melee Immunity
Melee Immunity.description: All melee-based damage debuffs such as Stun, Knockback, Disarm, and Out-of-Breath are negated.

Mental Fortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
Mental Fortitude.description: Advantage on saves against mind control.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: Can imitate sounds they have heard.

Mind Shield.name: Mind Shield
Mind Shield.description: Advantage on saves against mental attacks.

Mob Mentality.name: Mob Mentality
Mob Mentality.description: You have advantage on attack rolls when within 5 feet of an ally.

Natural Camouflage.name: Natural Camouflage
Natural Camouflage.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.

Natural Charmer.name: Natural Charmer
Natural Charmer.description: You have advantage on Persuasion checks when interacting with non-hostile NPCs.

Neither Snow Nor Rain.name: Neither Snow Nor Rain
Neither Snow Nor Rain.description: You gain advantage on saving throws against environmental hazards while on a delivery.

Night Vision.name: Night Vision
Night Vision.description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

Nimble Defense.name: Nimble Defense
Nimble Defense.description: While wearing light or no armor, your AC increases by 1 for every point of Dexterity bonus (maximum +3).

Nimble Escape.name: Nimble Escape
Nimble Escape.description: You can use the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

One with Earth.name: One with Earth
One with Earth.description: While touching the ground, you can sense vibrations within a 60-foot radius.

One with Nature.name: One with Nature
One with Nature.description: You can communicate simple ideas with animals and have advantage on Animal Handling checks.

Otherworldly Patron.name: Otherworldly Patron
Otherworldly Patron.description: You have a powerful entity as your patron, granting you unique abilities based on their nature.

Pain Tolerance.name: Pain Tolerance
Pain Tolerance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against pain-inducing effects.

Paranoia.name: Paranoia
Paranoia.description: You have advantage on Perception checks to spot hidden threats.

Passionate Aura.name: Passionate Aura
Passionate Aura.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain +1 to attack rolls and saving throws against fear effects.

Perfect Pitch.name: Perfect Pitch
Perfect Pitch.description: You have advantage on saving throws against sound-based effects and can perfectly mimic any sound you've heard.

Persistent Irritant.name: Persistent Irritant
Persistent Irritant.description: Enemies within 5 feet of you have disadvantage on concentration checks.

Pest Sense.name: Pest Sense
Pest Sense.description: You can detect the presence of vermin within 60 feet of you.

Plague Doctor.name: Plague Doctor
Plague Doctor.description: You have resistance to disease and can identify ailments with a successful Intelligence check.

Poison Resistance.name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description: Takes half damage from poison-based attacks.

Power of Belief.name: Power of Belief
Power of Belief.description: Once per day, you can reroll a failed healing ability and take the higher result.

Predator's Instinct.name: Predator's Instinct
Predator's Instinct.description: You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Protective Instinct.name: Protective Instinct
Protective Instinct.description: When an ally within 30 feet is attacked, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

Psychic Hotline.name: Psychic Hotline
Psychic Hotline.description: You can use your action to gain advantage on your next Charisma check.

Psychic Resistance.name: Psychic Resistance
Psychic Resistance.description: Takes half damage from psychic attacks.

Psychic Shield.name: Psychic Shield
Psychic Shield.description: Advantage on saves against psychic damage.

Quick Reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
Quick Reflexes.description: You can use your reaction to halve the damage from an attack you can see.

Quick Study.name: Quick Study
Quick Study.description: Can learn and replicate simple actions after observing them once.

QuickReflexes.name: QuickReflexes
QuickReflexes.description: Increases the user’s reaction time, giving a +1 bonus to dodge checks.

Quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
Quickdraw.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls when using a ranged weapon.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Regains 1d6 HP at the start of their turn if they have drunk blood in the last 24 hours.

Regimented Training.name: Regimented Training
Regimented Training.description: You can don or doff armor in half the usual time.

Relentless Endurance.name: Relentless Endurance
Relentless Endurance.description: Once per day when reduced to 0 HP can drop to 1 HP instead.

ReligiousAffiliationDetection.name: ReligiousAffiliationDetection
ReligiousAffiliationDetection.description: Instantly know the religious affiliation of all nearby mobs and crawlers.

Remote Detonator.name: Remote Detonator
Remote Detonator.description: If you’re one of those explodey guys, I bet you use a lot of Hobgoblin Pus or Troll Boom-Boom Paste to make your bombs pop. Those days are now over. This benefit allows you to magically remote-detonate any explosive that has been designated by you. This benefit offers multiple physical and interface-based triggering options when combined with a Sapper’s table.
Remote Detonator.effect: When using a Sapper’s Table, you gain access to the following physical and interface-based triggering options for any explosive you have designated: Physical Triggering Options: Timed Detonation: Set a timer on the explosive to detonate after a specified duration. Pressure Plate: Detonate the explosive when a certain amount of weight or pressure is applied. Tripwire: Rig a tripwire to detonate the explosive when disturbed. Proximity Sensor: Set the explosive to detonate when a creature or object enters a specified radius. Interface-Based Triggering Options: Magical Remote Control: Use a magical remote control to trigger the explosive from a distance. Telepathic Link: Establish a telepathic link to trigger the explosive mentally. Arcane Signal: Activate the explosive using a specific magical gesture or incantation. Rune Activation: Use a magical interface to activate a special rune on the explosive. Special Note: The range for remote triggering options is up to 120 feet, unless otherwise specified by the DM.

RemoveCursedItems.name: RemoveCursedItems
RemoveCursedItems.description: Allows the removal of cursed items.

RemoveDebuffs.name: RemoveDebuffs
RemoveDebuffs.description: Removes most health-seeping and disease-based debuff effects. Variable numbing effect on various other debuff types.

Resilient.name: Resilient
Resilient.description: Advantage on saving throws against exhaustion or stamina-based debuffs.

Resistance to Fire.name: Resistance to Fire
Resistance to Fire.description: Takes half damage from fire-based attacks.

Return to Sender.name: Return to Sender
Return to Sender.description: Once per day, you can redirect a ranged attack that misses you back at the attacker.

Ripe.name: Ripe
Ripe.description: All creatures with less than 50% health are indicated on your map. This does not increase your map’s view, but used in conjunction with other skills such as Pathfinder, it makes being a glory-stealing asshole really easy

Ritual Master.name: Ritual Master
Ritual Master.description: You have advantage on skill checks related to performing religious or spiritual rituals.

Rocky Hide.name: Rocky Hide
Rocky Hide.description: Your skin toughens, granting you a +1 bonus to your natural Armor Class.

Saddle Sure.name: Saddle Sure
Saddle Sure.description: You have advantage on saves to avoid falling off your mount.

Sepsis Debuff.name: Sepsis Debuff
Sepsis Debuff.description: All attacks, including magical attacks, now have a 15% chance to inflict the Sepsis debuff.

Shadow Meld.name: Shadow Meld
Shadow Meld.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in dim light or darkness.

ShatterEnchantment.name: ShatterEnchantment
ShatterEnchantment.description: Any attack that lands upon the buckler has a 1.5% chance to disarm the opponent. If the opponent is disarmed, there is a 90% chance the weapon will drop to the ground, a 5% chance the weapon will break, and a 5% chance the weapon will be immediately transferred to your inventory.

SheolHealth.name: SheolHealth
SheolHealth.description: User will not lose health while inside Sheol.

Short Fuse.name: Short Fuse
Short Fuse.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls.

Showmanship.name: Showmanship
Showmanship.description: Your critical hits inspire allies within 30 feet, granting them advantage on their next attack roll.

ShrineDestruction.name: ShrineDestruction
ShrineDestruction.description: Allows the destruction of church shrines without further ill effects from deities.

Silver Tongue.name: Silver Tongue
Silver Tongue.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks involving poetry or wordplay.

Skate or Die.name: Skate or Die
Skate or Die.description: Your speed increases by 10 feet, and you ignore difficult terrain while moving.

Social Lubricant.name: Social Lubricant
Social Lubricant.description: Your vape creations grant you advantage on Charisma checks in social situations.

Social Media Savvy.name: Social Media Savvy
Social Media Savvy.description: You can use your action to gain advantage on your next Charisma check by leveraging your online presence.

Spell Focus.name: Spell Focus
Spell Focus.description: Any energy-based spell that originates from the ocular region is caught and focused by these goggles, which allows for multiple combat and targeting options.

Spell Sculptor.name: Spell Sculptor
Spell Sculptor.description: Once per short rest, you can change the elemental damage type of one of your spells as you cast it.

Spiritual Conduit.name: Spiritual Conduit
Spiritual Conduit.description: You can sense the presence of spirits within 60 feet and communicate with them.

Steady Drinker.name: Steady Drinker
Steady Drinker.description: Negates the dexterity debuff when inebriated

Stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
Stonecunning.description: Advantage on checks related to stonework.

Street Smarts.name: Street Smarts
Street Smarts.description: You have advantage on Perception (Survival) checks in urban environments.

Structural Weakness.name: Structural Weakness
Structural Weakness.description: You can use an action to analyze a structure and identify its weak points, granting advantage on attacks against it.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: Advantage on checks and saves against being knocked prone.

Surgical Strikes.name: Surgical Strikes
Surgical Strikes.description: Your critical hits deal an extra die of damage.

Suspicious Mind.name: Suspicious Mind
Suspicious Mind.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
Taskmaster.description: Allies within earshot of your commands gain a +2 bonus to Strength checks.

TaxStipend.name: TaxStipend
TaxStipend.description: Taxes received: 432 Gold every 10 days from Medium Skyfowl Settlement.

Terrain Mastery.name: Terrain Mastery
Terrain Mastery.description: You can move through difficult terrain without penalty.

Toxin Resistance.name: Toxin Resistance
Toxin Resistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

Truth Seeker.name: Truth Seeker
Truth Seeker.description: You have advantage on Perception (Insight) checks to determine if someone is lying.

Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
Unbreakable.description: You have advantage on stamina saving throws to maintain concentration on spells or abilities.

Unbreakable Formation.name: Unbreakable Formation
Unbreakable Formation.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

BareKnuckleBonus.name: Bare Knuckle Bonus
BareKnuckleBonus.description: The Enchanted War Gauntlet of the Exalted Grull does not negate the user's bare-knuckle skill bonus. This allows the wielder to benefit from any bonuses or abilities related to unarmed combat while using the gauntlet, effectively combining the benefits of both armed and unarmed fighting styles.

Unbreakable Line.name: Unbreakable Line
Unbreakable Line.description: While wielding a shield, allies adjacent to you gain +2 to their AC.

Unbreakable Spirit.name: Unbreakable Spirit
Unbreakable Spirit.description: Once per long rest, when you drop to 0 hit points, you can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

Unbreakable Stance.name: Unbreakable Stance
Unbreakable Stance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against effects that would knock you prone or move you against your will.

Uncanny Intuition.name: Uncanny Intuition
Uncanny Intuition.description: Once per day, you can reroll a failed Perception check.

Undead Slayer.name: Undead Slayer
Undead Slayer.description: +25% Magical damage against all sapient undead.

Unpredictable Biology.name: Unpredictable Biology
Unpredictable Biology.description: At the start of each day, roll a d20 to gain a random beneficial mutation for 24 hours.

Unyielding Loyalty.name: Unyielding Loyalty
Unyielding Loyalty.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Upgradeable.name: Upgradeable
Upgradeable.description: This base stat upgrade increases by +1 for every compatible patch that is added to this jacket.

Vape Resistance.name: Vape Resistance
Vape Resistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against inhaled poisons and gases.

Versatile.name: Versatile
Versatile.description: Can choose an additional +2 in any skill.

Voice of Authority.name: Voice of Authority
Voice of Authority.description: Your commands can be clearly heard by allies within 60 feet, even in the chaos of battle.

Vulpine Charm.name: Vulpine Charm
Vulpine Charm.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks against creatures that are not hostile toward you.

Wall Climbing.name: Wall Climbing
Wall Climbing.description: Can climb difficult surfaces including upside down on ceilings without needing to make an ability check.

Warrior's Pride.name: Warrior's Pride
Warrior's Pride.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Water Camouflage.name: Water Camouflage
Water Camouflage.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in aquatic environments.

Water Retention.name: Water Retention
Water Retention.description: Requires less water than other races to survive.

Weapon Mastery.name: Weapon Mastery
Weapon Mastery.description: You can use your Strength modifier instead of Dexterity for attack and damage rolls with finesse weapons.

Weapon Whisperer.name: Weapon Whisperer
Weapon Whisperer.description: You can identify the magical properties of any bladed weapon by examining it for 1 minute.

Weather Sense.name: Weather Sense
Weather Sense.description: You can accurately predict the weather for the next 24 hours.

Wind Whisper.name: Wind Whisper
Wind Whisper.description: You can cast Message at will, without expending a spell slot.

Wings of Freedom.name: Wings of Freedom
Wings of Freedom.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
